messages.subject: FAQ for Unschooling-dotcom
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all I seem to have inadvertently deleted the message that I was sent about how to post to the list (obviously I figured that one out from ONEList s site
messages.messageBody:
Hi all

I seem to have inadvertently deleted the message that I was sent about how to post to the
list (obviously I figured that one out from ONEList's site <g>), the list commands, and
other FAQ about ONEList and about Unschooling-dotcom's ettiquette in particular. Could
somebody email me a copy of this privately, please?

Thanks
Mandy from NZ

--
